name: paragraph-builder
description: Building a text with paragraphs from a continuous uninterrupted text.

scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.updatePackages: ncu -e 2 || (ncu -u && npm i --ignore-scripts && npm run commitAndUpload)
scripts.commitAndUpload: npm test && git commit -a -m 'update' && npm version patch && npm publish && git push

author: Jo√£o PImentel Ferreira
